extendedInfo.description: With Solo you can play to your favourite songs, or create some of your own...It's ideal for jamming sessions when you don't have your guitar with you, or an excellent reference for when you do!Features include:* Classical guitar, acoustic guitar and electric guitars, each with authentic sound* A huge chord library with chord diagrams - hear and see how each chord is played.* Create your own chords* Play along to any music loaded on your phone* Get chord and lyric overlays from the web - excellent for teaching yourself new songs to play (this feature is provided via a free add-on app)* Play with a capo to fit your vocal range* Create, load and save chord layouts for your favourite songs* Customize the UI to fit your playing style* Use multitouch on supported devices* Uses Immersionâs MOTIV haptic effects for advanced haptic feedback* Great for S Pen Samsung Galaxy Note

reviews.title: Problem downloading update
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this update because the app wouldn\'t show the chord diagram. Now that it has come, I\'m not able to update it. It says,\"package file is invalid\". Help will be appreciated.
reviews.author: Nilay Rathod

reviews.title: Love it, but have one suggestion.
reviews.comment: There is no better virtual guitar app for android, but it would be better still with string bending in fret mode. Regardless, I thoroughly recommend this app.
reviews.author: Jacob Roberts

reviews.title: Feels like a toy
reviews.comment: Can\'t hammer on / pull off strings, making it feel more like a keyboard than a stringed instrument, if playing an open E string than pressing & holding the third fret G it continues to play E note regardless making it impossible to actually play it like a guitar, changing chords with any speed is impossible as the app cant keep up, slides/bends/vibrato also non existent,  still along way to go before remotely emulating a guitar
reviews.author: Adam Clarke

reviews.title: Export to WAV!?
reviews.comment: Wow! I bought Solo on my G1 and it was worth the price *then*. Being able to export to WAV is an insanely awesome feature that makes Solo a serious tool, and Coding Caveman a serious developer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Needs 15 frets best app on the whole store
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the app
reviews.comment: Great app.  Great support.  Really fun.  Well worth price.
reviews.author: Fred Morgan

reviews.title: Samsung s2
reviews.comment: It only plays one or two strings at a time so it i cant really play songs on it
reviews.author: Junior Ceant

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: Only app I\'ve paid for...very cool
reviews.author: Douglas Mason

reviews.title: Bought the best!
reviews.comment: Chords, Fret mode, Electric and Acoustic guitars, Vibrating strings! This really performs on the Nexus 7, love playing it during t.v. commercials, sometimes I even jam along with the CSI sound tracks! Having loads of fun, thanks for the hard work Coding Caveman, you rock! Additional: YOU still rock! Excellent updates!
reviews.author: Kerry Cheeks

reviews.title: Great! but I CANT SAVE!
reviews.comment: Everytime i try to save it gives an error report 0.o
reviews.author: Danny dang

reviews.title: Wish I didn\'t buy it
reviews.comment: Meh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The free version works better!
reviews.comment: I had the free version then thought I\'d buy this, but only one string plays at a time on the paid version, I can\'t strum at all! You need to get your bugs worked out
reviews.author: Austin Luce

reviews.title: 2 Good!
reviews.comment: A developer who keeps working hard 4 your money! Runs flawless on SG3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just great
reviews.comment: Works very well. Thanks for the help with the add-ons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWEsome!
reviews.comment: One of a kind... must have for those of us that get inspiration at the drop of anything...
reviews.author: Twig TWK

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Work really well. Love it!
reviews.author: azrul ilman adi sabri

reviews.title: Thanks man
reviews.comment: Very handy for me.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So many features.  worth the $ for any guitarist, novice to pro
reviews.comment: Flawless.  Love the custom chords, and layout.  The addition of the fretboard is  nice to. Runs smooth, hands down the best mobile guitar app. This one does it all
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solo
reviews.comment: Great for setting down simple ideas and testing out new chord ideas when you are away from your guitar. Got the latest Update and I am thick so a couple of emails to codeing caveman and he replied within minutes to tell me how to get the best out of this app, now I know how to make it sing like a bird. Just keeps getting better every time I open it 5 more stars from me. Dave D.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Guitar solo
reviews.comment: Brilliant app and lots of fun. As a guitar player on holiday and no guitar to hand this app works great and keeps me amused  :-)
reviews.author: Graham Pascoe
